details: The "Paternity Benefit Scheme" by the Bihar Building & Other Construction Workers' Welfare Board, Labour Resources Department, Government of Bihar, provides ₹6,000/- per childbirth to the male workers, provided that their wife is not registered with the Board.
benefits: Financial Assistance of ₹6,000/- per childbirth for upto two childbirths.
eligibility: The applicant should be a worker.
The applicant should be a male.
The applicant should be engaged in building or construction work.
The applicant should be registered with the "Bihar Building & Other Construction Workers Welfare Board".
The applicant's membership with the Welfare Board must be active at the time of application.
The applicant should have at least one year of membership with the Board.
The wife of the applicant should not be registered with the Board.
The benefits will be applicable for the first two childbirths.
application_process: Online registration on the official website of the Bihar Building and Other Construction Workers Welfare Board.
Fill in all mandatory fields and upload necessary documents.
documents_required: Identity Card of the Registered Worker
Proof of Age at the Time of Registration
